targets.query: SELECT mean("avgDuration") FROM "30d"."elementTimeSeries" WHERE ("testEnvironment"::tag =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest"::tag =~ /^$system_under_test$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "elementType"::tag

SELECT mean("elementsPerSecond") FROM "30d"."elementTimeSeries" WHERE ("testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "elementType"::tag

SELECT mean("errorRate") FROM "30d"."elementTimeSeries" WHERE ("testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "elementType"::tag

SELECT mean("elementsPerSecond") FROM "30d"."elementTimeSeries" WHERE ("testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "elementType"::tag = 'TRANSACTION') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "userPath"::tag, "name"::tag

SELECT mean("elementsPerSecond") FROM "30d"."elementTimeSeries" WHERE ("testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "elementType"::tag = 'REQUEST') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "userPath"::tag, "name"::tag, "parent"::tag

SELECT mean("errorRate") FROM "30d"."elementTimeSeries" WHERE ("testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "elementType"::tag = 'TRANSACTION') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name"::tag, "userPath"::tag

SELECT mean("errorRate") FROM "30d"."elementTimeSeries" WHERE ("testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "elementType"::tag = 'REQUEST') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name"::tag, "userPath"::tag, "parent"::tag

SELECT last("passed"), last("errors"), last("count") FROM "30d"."elementValues" WHERE ("testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "elementType"::tag = 'TRANSACTION') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name", "userPath"::tag, "parent"::tag

SELECT last("passed"), last("errors"), last("count") FROM "30d"."elementValues" WHERE ("testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "elementType"::tag = 'REQUEST') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name", "userPath"::tag, "parent"::tag

SELECT count("message") FROM "30d"."errors" WHERE ("testEnvironment"::tag =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest"::tag =~ /^$system_under_test$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "userPath"::tag, "code"::tag, "request"::tag, "transaction"::tag

SELECT count("message") FROM "30d"."errors" WHERE ("testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "request"::tag, "transaction"::tag, "userPath"::tag, "code"::tag

SELECT mean("userLoad") FROM "30d"."resultTimeSeries" WHERE ("testEnvironment"::tag =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest"::tag =~ /^$system_under_test$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "nodeName"::tag fill(null)

SELECT last("perc50"), last("perc90"), last("perc95"), last("perc99"), last("minDuration"), last("avgDuration"), last("maxDuration") FROM "30d"."elementValues" WHERE ("systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "elementType"::tag = 'TRANSACTION') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name", "userPath"::tag, "name"::tag

SELECT mean("minDuration") FROM "30d"."elementTimeSeries" WHERE ("testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "elementType"::tag = 'TRANSACTION') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name", "userPath"::tag

SELECT mean("maxDuration") FROM "30d"."elementTimeSeries" WHERE ("testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "elementType"::tag = 'TRANSACTION') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name", "userPath"::tag

SELECT mean("avgDuration") FROM "30d"."elementTimeSeries" WHERE ("testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "elementType"::tag = 'TRANSACTION') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name", "userPath"::tag

SELECT mean("perc50") FROM "30d"."elementValues" WHERE ("testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "elementType"::tag = 'TRANSACTION') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name", "userPath"::tag

SELECT mean("perc90") FROM "30d"."elementValues" WHERE ("testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "elementType"::tag = 'TRANSACTION') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name", "userPath"::tag

SELECT mean("perc99") FROM "30d"."elementValues" WHERE ("testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "elementType"::tag = 'TRANSACTION') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name", "userPath"::tag

SELECT last("minDuration"), last("avgDuration"), last("maxDuration") FROM "30d"."elementValues" WHERE ("systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "elementType"::tag = 'REQUEST') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name", "userPath"::tag, "parent"::tag, "name"::tag

SELECT mean("minDuration") FROM "30d"."elementTimeSeries" WHERE ("testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "elementType"::tag = 'REQUEST') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name", "userPath"::tag, "parent"::tag

SELECT mean("maxDuration") FROM "30d"."elementTimeSeries" WHERE ("testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "elementType"::tag = 'REQUEST') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name", "userPath"::tag, "parent"::tag

SELECT mean("avgDuration") FROM "30d"."elementTimeSeries" WHERE ("testEnvironment" =~ /^$test_environment$/ AND "systemUnderTest" =~ /^$system_under_test$/ AND "elementType"::tag = 'REQUEST') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name", "userPath"::tag, "parent"::tag

list.definition: show tag values from resultTimeseries with key="testEnvironment" where "systemUnderTest" =~ /$system_under_test/
